name: Magi of the Night
description:
You are Magi. You must rebuild Your tower to gain access to the skylands.
Gather resources to upgrade your gear and build your tower!

The game was made using Unity3D. Most of the art assets are made using Blender and photoshop.

Controls:
WASD - Movement
Left mouse button - Throw projectiles
Right mouse button - Gather resources/Exit tower
Tab - Open the workshop (Inside the tower)
